name: Parent's House
description: Live with your parents. It's free, and they won't kick you out even though they probably should.

name: One Room Apartment
description: An incredibly small apartment. There's a separate room for the toilet, so it's technically two rooms! Cockroaches incl. at no cost.

name: 1K Apartment
description: A very small apartment with a separate kitchen. You no longer need to heat your cup ramen in the same room you eat it in!

name: 2K Apartment
description: An apartment with two rooms and a kitchen. What will you do with all that extra space?

name: 2DK Apartment
description: A decent sized apartment, perfect for more than one person to live in at the same time.

name: 2LDK Apartment
description: A full sized apartment with a living room, dining room, kitchen, and two bedrooms.

name: Large 2LDK Apartment
description: A very spacious 2LDK, perfect for a wealthy couple with no kids.

name: 3LDK Apartment
description: A full sized apartment with a living room, dining room, kitchen, and three bedrooms. Good for a growing family.

name: 4LDK Apartment
description: A massive apartment with 4 bedrooms located in downtown Tokyo.

name: Luxurious 4LDK
description: An extremely luxurious apartment for a wealthy businessman.

name: Small Mansion
description: A small condo for a starting family. High purchase cost but no rent price.
